# DmiProperty.Bios.FirmwareMajorRelease property

Gets a value representing the key to retrieve the property value.

Identifies the major release of the embedded controller firmware.

Key Composition

* Structure: Bios
* Property: FirmwareMajorRelease
* Unit: None

Return Value

Type: Nullable where T is Byte

Remarks
